entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Langley

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers this evening. Rain beginning overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
